headline: Checkered Flag Getaways: Agoda Reveals Top Formula 1 Host Destinations Among South Korean Travelers
summary: The global popularity of Formula 1 (F1) continues to rise, with strong momentum among South Korean fans. Interest increased further following the release of "F1: The Movie" last year, which featured appearances by current F1 drivers including Lewis Hamilton, Max Verstappen, and Lando Norris, introducing the excitement of the sport to a broader audience. With the 2026 FIA Formula One World Championship approaching, digital travel platform Agoda has unveiled the top F1 host destinations in the fir
